attributes.action: All sitting MPs to accept 4 illegal immigrants into their households
attributes.additional_details: The influx of illegal immigrants is not abating. So to focus the minds of the ruling elite make them accommodate 4 illegal immigrants into each of their taxpayer funded house’s
attributes.background: Make it law that all sitting MPs and members of the house of Lord have to accommodate 4 illegal immigrants.

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions about whether to take people into their home are a matter for each individual, not the UK Government or Parliament.
